languages.text: Когда яростные мстители обрушились на протекторат фон Валанциус, Эксплораторы не забыли о союзнических узах и спасли... то, что посчитали достойным спасения — богатые библиотеки, священные механизмы и производственные комплексы.

When wrathful rivals attacked the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.
languages.original_text: Когда яростные мстители обрушились на протекторат фон Валанциус, Эксплораторы не забыли о союзнических узах и спасли... то, что посчитали достойным спасения — богатые библиотеки, священные механизмы и производственные комплексы.

traits.locale_text: When wrathful vengers came down on von Valancius' protectorate, Explorators did not forget about the bond of alliance, and saved... the things, that they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms and manufacturing complexes.

When wrathful rivals came down on the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.

When wrathful rivals attacked the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.

languages.text: 当冯·瓦兰修斯王朝愤怒的对手对王朝发动袭击时，开拓者们并没有忘记他们之间的盟约。他们选择拯救……那些他们认为值得拯救的东西，如庞大的图书馆、神圣的机器与制造综合中心。
languages.original_text: When wrathful rivals attacked the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.

traits.locale_text: 当冯·瓦兰修斯王朝愤怒的对手对王朝发动袭击时，开拓者们并没有忘记他们之间的盟约。他们选择拯救……那些他们认为值得拯救的东西，如庞大的图书馆、神圣的机器与制造综合中心。

languages.text: Als rachsüchtige Rivalen das Protektorat von Valancius attackierten, vergaßen die Exploratoren die Bande des Bündnisses nicht. Sie retteten ... die Dinge, die sie für rettungswürdig hielten, nämlich große Bibliotheken, heilige Mechanismen und Produktionsanlagen.
languages.original_text: When wrathful rivals attacked the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.

traits.locale_text: Als rachsüchtige Rivalen das Protektorat von Valancius attackierten, vergaßen die Exploratoren die Bande des Bündnisses nicht. Sie retteten ... die Dinge, die sie für rettungswürdig hielten, nämlich große Bibliotheken, heilige Mechanismen und Produktionsanlagen.

languages.text: Lorsque des rivaux furieux attaquèrent le protectorat von Valancius, les Explorators honorèrent leur alliance en sauvant... les choses qu'ils jugeaient dignes de salut : d'immenses bibliothèques, des mécanismes sacrés et des complexes de fabrication.
languages.original_text: When wrathful rivals attacked the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque des rivaux furieux attaquèrent le protectorat von Valancius, les Explorators honorèrent leur alliance en sauvant... les choses qu'ils jugeaient dignes de salut : d'immenses bibliothèques, des mécanismes sacrés et des complexes de fabrication.

languages.text: Cuando sus rivales furiosos asediaron el protectorado von Valancius, los exploradores no olvidaron el vínculo de su alianza, por lo que salvaron... lo que consideraron digno de salvar: grandes bibliotecas, mecanismos sagrados y complejos de fabricación.
languages.original_text: When wrathful rivals attacked the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.

traits.locale_text: Cuando sus rivales furiosos asediaron el protectorado von Valancius, los exploradores no olvidaron el vínculo de su alianza, por lo que salvaron... lo que consideraron digno de salvar: grandes bibliotecas, mecanismos sagrados y complejos de fabricación.

languages.text: 怒れるライバルたちがフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領に攻め寄せたとき、エクスプロレイターは同盟の絆を忘れることなく、彼らが救済に値すると判断したもの…広範な図書館、神聖なメカニズム、製造複合施設を救うことを選んだ。
languages.original_text: When wrathful rivals attacked the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.

traits.locale_text: 怒れるライバルたちがフォン・ヴァランシウス保護領に攻め寄せたとき、エクスプロレイターは同盟の絆を忘れることなく、彼らが救済に値すると判断したもの…広範な図書館、神聖なメカニズム、製造複合施設を救うことを選んだ。

languages.text: Von Valancius protektorasının öfkeli rakiplerin saldırısına uğradığı vakit Keşiftörler, kurdukları ittifakı unutmayıp kurtarılmaya layık olduğunu düşündükleri büyük kütüphaneleri, kutsal mekanizmalar ve üretim komplekslerini kurtardı.
languages.original_text: When wrathful rivals attacked the von Valancius protectorate, the Explorators did not forget their bonds of alliance, choosing to save... the things they deemed worthy of salvation — extensive libraries, sacred mechanisms, and manufacturing complexes.

traits.locale_text: Öfke dolu rakipleri von Valancius protektorasına saldırdığında, Keşiftörler müttefiklik bağlarını unutmadılar ve... Kurtuluşa layık olduğunu düşündükleri şeyleri kurtarmayı seçtiler: Büyük kütüphaneler, kutsal mekanizmalar ve üretim kompleksleri.
